error.message: You do not have permission to access this resource

Forbidden.description: Authorization failed - valid key but insufficient permissions

error.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
Too many requests. Retry after 30 seconds.

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: Unix timestamp when rate limit resets

Unauthorized.description: Authentication failed - missing or invalid API key

ApiKey.description: ApiKey represents an authentication credential for programmatic API access.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the key was created.
created_at.title: created_at

expires_at.description: Expiration timestamp. If set, the key becomes invalid after this time.
expires_at.title: expires_at

id.description:
Unique ID for the API key.
 Pattern: key_[0-9a-hjkmnp-tv-z]{26}
id.title: id

is_active.description:
Whether the key is currently active (not revoked and not expired).
 Computed: is_active = (revoked_at == null) && (expires_at == null || expires_at > now())
is_active.title: is_active

key_prefix.description:
Truncated key prefix for identification in UI (e.g., "ffy_prod_01jd4h5...").
 Shows the first 16 characters for better uniqueness while maintaining security.
key_prefix.title: key_prefix

organization_id.description:
ID of the organization this key belongs to.
 Pattern: org_[0-9a-hjkmnp-tv-z]{26}
organization_id.title: organization_id

revoked_at.description: Timestamp when the key was revoked. Null if the key has not been revoked.
revoked_at.title: revoked_at

ApiKey.title: ApiKey

AttachPolicyRequest.description: AttachPolicyRequest specifies a policy to attach to a document.

policy_id.description:
Policy ID to attach.
 Pattern: pol_[0-9a-hjkmnp-tv-z]{26}
policy_id.title: policy_id

AttachPolicyRequest.title: AttachPolicyRequest

CreateApiKeyRequest.description: CreateApiKeyRequest contains the data needed to create a new API key.

expires_at.description:
Expiration timestamp. If not set, the key does not expire.
 When set, must be in the future and within 1 year.
 Security note: Keys without expiration should be rotated periodically.
timestamp.gt_now = true
timestamp.within = 8760h0m0s
expires_at.title: expires_at

organization_id.description:
Organization ID to create the key for.
 Pattern: org_[0-9a-hjkmnp-tv-z]{26}
organization_id.title: organization_id

CreateApiKeyRequest.title: CreateApiKeyRequest

CreateApiKeyResponse.description: CreateApiKeyResponse contains the newly created API key and its secret.

secret.description:
The API key secret. This is only returned once and cannot be retrieved later.
 Format: ffy_{env}_{base32_uuid7}{base62_random}
 - env: "prod" or "test"
 - base32_uuid7: 26 chars (TypeID base32 alphabet: 0-9a-hjkmnp-tv-z)
 - base62_random: 43 chars (0-9A-Za-z)
 Store this value securely - it will not be shown again.
 SECURITY WARNING: This field must NEVER be logged. Handlers must redact secrets from all logs.
secret.title: secret

CreateApiKeyResponse.title: CreateApiKeyResponse

CreateDocumentRequest.description: CreateDocumentRequest contains the file and metadata for creating a document.

access_level.description: Document access level. Defaults to organization if user belongs to an org, otherwise private.
access_level.title: access_level

payload_key.description: Storage key for uploaded file (set by server)
payload_key.title: payload_key

CreateDocumentRequest.title: CreateDocumentRequest

CreateDocumentResponse.description: CreateDocumentResponse contains the newly created document.
CreateDocumentResponse.title: CreateDocumentResponse

CreateOrganizationRequest.description: CreateOrganizationRequest contains the data needed to create a new organization.

owner_user_id.description:
Owner user ID. If not provided, the authenticated user becomes the owner.
 Authorization: Specifying a different user requires system maintainer role.
 Required when the caller is a service account (service accounts cannot own organizations).
 Pattern: user_[0-9a-hjkmnp-tv-z]{26}
owner_user_id.title: owner_user_id

ListApiKeysRequest.description: ListApiKeysRequest specifies filters and pagination for listing API keys.

include_revoked.description:
Whether to include revoked keys in the response.
 Default: false (only active and expired-but-not-revoked keys are returned).
 When true, all keys including revoked ones are returned.
 Note: Expired keys are always included unless also revoked; use is_active to filter.

organization_id.description:
Organization ID to list keys for.
 Pattern: org_[0-9a-hjkmnp-tv-z]{26}
organization_id.title: organization_id

page_size.description: Maximum number of items to return per page (1-100). Default: 50.
page_size.title: page_size

page_token.description: Opaque pagination token from a previous response.
page_token.title: page_token

ListApiKeysRequest.title: ListApiKeysRequest

ListDocumentsRequest.description:
ListDocumentsRequest specifies filters and pagination for listing documents.
 Follows Google AIP-158 for pagination field naming.
 Uses Vanguard-compatible dot notation for nested filters: ?created.after=...&created.before=...
created_time_range // created.after must be before created.before

access_level.description:
Filter by access level(s). Returns documents matching ANY of the specified levels.
 Accepts single value or comma-separated list.
 REST: ?access_level=private or ?access_level=private,organization
 Accepts clean enum names (case-insensitive): "private", "organization", "public"
access_level.title: access_level

created.description:
Filter by creation time range.
 REST: ?created.after=2024-01-01T00:00:00Z&created.before=2024-12-31T23:59:59Z
created.title: created

created_by_id.description:
Filter by creator ID(s) (user or service account). Returns documents matching ANY of the specified IDs.
 Accepts single value or comma-separated list.
 REST: ?created_by_id=user_01h2xcejqtf2nbrexx3vqjhp41 or ?created_by_id=user_xxx,svc_yyy
created_by_id.title: created_by_id

page_size.description: Maximum number of items to return per page (1-100). Default: 50.
page_size.title: page_size

page_token.description:
Opaque pagination token from a previous response.
 Pass next_page_token or prev_page_token from a previous response to continue pagination.
 Empty or omitted for the first page.
page_token.title: page_token

processing_status.description:
Filter by processing status(es). Returns documents matching ANY of the specified statuses.
 Accepts single value or comma-separated list.
 REST: ?processing_status=ready or ?processing_status=processing,ready,failed
 Accepts clean enum names (case-insensitive): "processing", "ready", "failed"
processing_status.title: processing_status

ListDocumentsRequest.title: ListDocumentsRequest

ListDocumentsResponse.description: ListDocumentsResponse contains a page of documents.
ListDocumentsResponse.title: ListDocumentsResponse

bearerAuth.description: Bearer authentication header of the form Bearer <token>, where <token> is your auth token.

info.description:
Factify API enables you to create, manage, and control access to legally-binding documents that replace PDFs.

## Authentication

Bearer authentication header of the form Bearer <token>, where <token> is your auth token.

```
Authorization: Bearer ffy...
```

## Rate Limiting

- 1000 requests per minute per API key
- 100 requests per minute for resource creation (POST)

## Errors

Factify uses conventional HTTP status codes and returns structured error responses:

```json
{
  "error": {
    "type": "invalid_request_error",
    "message": "Document title cannot be empty",
    "param": "title",
    "code": "missing_required_field"
  }
}
```
info.title: Factify API
